title: IMS User
description: This model represents an authenticated IMS User. The IMS user prinicpal is a user account under Adobe's identity management system (IMS).

principalId.description: Principal id identifies a user account in IMS. Its value is equivalent to the standard claim, `sub` as mentioned in the [openid connect 1.0 standard claims](http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#StandardClaim). This value can be obtained by fetching the [userinfo resource](http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#UserInfo) for a particular user [in IMS](https://wiki.corp.adobe.com/display/ims/IMS+API+-+userinfo).
